title: Kadhal Oru Dhevathaiyin Lyrics Marina
stanzas:
kadhal, kan rendum
sandhithu pesum mozhiya
illai kaanaatha oorukku
pogum vazhiyaa.

kadhal oayaamal
vaayaadum alai kadalaa.
illai mounathil
thandikkum sirai kadhavaa.

kadhal
anal tharum vayila
punal tharum mazhaiya
bayam tharum puyala

kaanal alaiyaa
verum katchi pizhaiya
illai gangaiyile
pongi varum thaneer idhuva

thoondil valaiya
nenjai thaakkum kolaiya
irandhum vazhavaikkum
marundhaa. virundhaa.

pookkal kadaiyaa
uyir vaangum kadaiya
idhu vetri tholvi
rendum modhum padaiyaa

thiyaana nilaiyaa
poi pesum kalaiyaa
thooral nindra pinnum
thoorum, nilaiyaa

kadhal, kan rendum
sandhithu pesum mozhiya
illai kaanaatha oorukku
pogum vazhiyaa.

kadhal oayaamal
vaayaadum alai kadalaa.
illai mounathil
thandikkum sirai kadhavaa.
